name: GET_templates-template_id
description: **This endpoint allows you to retrieve a single transactional template.**

on-behalf-of.default: The subuser's username. This header generates the API call as if the subuser account was making the call.

$ul: **generation**: Defines the generation of the template.
**id**: The ID of the transactional template.
**name**: The name for the transactional template.
**updated_at **: The date and time that this transactional template version was updated.
**versions**: The different versions of this transactional template.
